sections.description:
Colors

Fonts

Papers

Ink Marks

Standard Icons

Strathmroe is design inspired by a pad of paper in the hand. Subtle Textures and Layer shadows keep the readablity very high.
Sharp clean fonts are the to reenforce a modern and trust worthy product.
sections.markup:
Mulifont-family: 'Muli', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

Mu

sections.description: Strathmroe is strongly based on semantic HTML so much of the design will come together with basic structured html.
Components are basic HTML patterns enhanced by either a class decorator or a container wrapper.

modifiers.name: .hollow
modifiers.description: All button states can become hollow

modifiers.name: .clear
modifiers.description: All button states can become hollow

modifiers.name: .dropdown
modifiers.description: All button states can become hollow

sections.description:
Can I Use Markdown

Highly sturctured Combination of components to make a functional streamlined and consistent experiance when asking for information.
Structured containers to bring content and ui together.

This is not part of the style of Strathmore

This is a collection of documentation types that can be used as templates when doecuemting the Styles of Strathmore. It is all based off of the "SC5"
This is how you define a container
This is how templates can stack inside of other templates
This is how templates can stack inside of other templates
Many Objects have modifiers like psudo classes and classes applied to make them look different.

modifiers.name: .alert
modifiers.description: A highlight indicating you’ve already given a star.

sections.description:
